name: part_003
file: tmp_【#常闇トワ4周年記念LIVE】Special Thank U!! J Medley 【3DLIVE】 [APbMhuPbwkE]_gemini-3-flash-preview/reencoded/part_003.mov

subtitles.original: どこにいたとしても私は
subtitles.english: Wherever I may be, I will always

subtitles.original: そう世界で独りのオリジナル
subtitles.english: remain the one and only original in this world.

subtitles.original: 誇らしく思って
subtitles.english: I'll think of it with pride...

subtitles.original: 増えてな 嬉しいな
subtitles.english: ...and I'd be happy if there were more.

subtitles.original: 境界の線で切り分けて
subtitles.english: Cutting through the boundary line,

subtitles.original: こちら側の世界で
subtitles.english: in the world on this side,

subtitles.original: 冗談な君の天使が
subtitles.english: your joke of an angel

subtitles.original: 首を振る
subtitles.english: shakes its head.

subtitles.original: 気づいてしまった
subtitles.english: I've realized it now,

subtitles.original: 悪は見逃せばいいから
subtitles.english: so just look the other way from evil.

subtitles.original: 帰り道を交換しよう
subtitles.english: Let's swap our ways home.

subtitles.original: 私が希望になるの
subtitles.english: I will become the hope.

subtitles.original: お別れは少し寂しいけれど
subtitles.english: Saying goodbye is a little lonely, but...

subtitles.original: いつか目尻に作った傷も
subtitles.english: even the scar I once made by my eye...

subtitles.original: 誇りに立ち向かった証だから
subtitles.english: ...is proof that I stood tall with pride.

subtitles.original: いつかハッピーエンドになるまで
subtitles.english: Until a happy ending comes one day,

subtitles.original: 世界を相手に戦うの
subtitles.english: I'll keep fighting against the world.

subtitles.original: こんな乱暴な私をずっと
subtitles.english: For always loving

subtitles.original: 愛してくれてありがとう
subtitles.english: such a rowdy person like me, thank you.

subtitles.original: これはバッドエンドなんかじゃない
subtitles.english: This is by no means a bad ending.

subtitles.original: どこにいたとしても私は
subtitles.english: Wherever I may be, I will always

subtitles.original: あなたの唯一無二のオリジナル
subtitles.english: remain your one and only original.

subtitles.original: 誇らしく生きるよ
subtitles.english: I'll live with pride.

subtitles.original: さぁあるべき場所に帰ろう
subtitles.english: Now, let's return to where we belong.

subtitles.original: さよなら 追憶のセブンティーン
subtitles.english: Farewell, the Seventeen of my memories.

subtitles.original: オートマチック！
subtitles.english: Automatic!

subtitles.original: 街を 切り裂くような排気音が
subtitles.english: An exhaust note that seems to tear through the city

subtitles.original: 足元で唸っている
subtitles.english: is roaring beneath my feet.

subtitles.original: 猛スピードで進む
subtitles.english: Moving at breakneck speed,

subtitles.original: 消えた テールランプの在り処
subtitles.english: searching for where the taillights vanished,

subtitles.original: 探して真っ直ぐに
subtitles.english: I head straight forward.

subtitles.original: 闇を スクラップにする強さで
subtitles.english: With a strength that turns darkness into scrap,

subtitles.original: ひた走る道路にはもう
subtitles.english: there are no longer any streetlights

subtitles.original: 街灯さえないけれど
subtitles.english: on the road I'm speeding along, but...

subtitles.original: きっと ヘッドライト一つあれば
subtitles.english: surely, as long as I have a single headlight,

subtitles.original: 何もいらないな
subtitles.english: I don't need anything else.

subtitles.original: ガレキの下に埋もれた 弱虫の声は
subtitles.english: The voice of a coward buried under the rubble...

subtitles.original: いくら耳澄ましても 聞こえやしないさ
subtitles.english: ...cannot be heard, no matter how hard I listen.

subtitles.original: 追いかけてくる後悔が 視界を塞ぐ前に
subtitles.english: Before the chasing regrets can block my view,

subtitles.original: 追いついた未来の端っこで何度も
subtitles.english: at the edge of the future I've caught up to,

subtitles.original: あなたを救い出すよ
subtitles.english: I will save you over and over again.

subtitles.original: 不意に 記憶がブレーキをかけた
subtitles.english: Suddenly, my memories slammed on the brakes.

subtitles.original: 舌打ちの矛先は
subtitles.english: The target of my clicking tongue

subtitles.original: 覗き込むミラーの向こう
subtitles.english: is beyond the mirror I'm peering into.

subtitles.original: 自分の 意気地なさに気づいている
subtitles.english: I've realized my own lack of courage,

subtitles.original: 時間などないのに
subtitles.english: even though there's no time to waste.

subtitles.original: ガレキの下から漏れた 弱虫の声は
subtitles.english: The voice of a coward leaking from under the rubble...

subtitles.original: いくら耳塞いでも 痛いほど響いてた
subtitles.english: ...echoed painfully, no matter how I covered my ears.

subtitles.original: あの日交わした返事を 忘れてたまるもんかと
subtitles.english: Vowing never to forget the answer we swapped that day,

subtitles.original: 震えた心が今も うるさいほど
subtitles.english: my trembling heart, even now,

subtitles.original: その名前を叫んでる
subtitles.english: is screaming that name so loud it's noisy.

subtitles.original: ヒーロー ぶって笑っていた
subtitles.english: Until I can wipe

subtitles.original: あなたの両頬を
subtitles.english: both of your cheeks

subtitles.original: 拭うまで止まらない
subtitles.english: that were smiling while acting like a hero, I won't stop.

subtitles.original: あぁそうさ あの夜から
subtitles.english: Ah, that's right. Since that night,

subtitles.original: あなたを迎えに来たんだ
subtitles.english: I've come to get you.

subtitles.original: 何度しくじろうとも
subtitles.english: No matter how many times I might fail.
